headline: 3 Reasons PKG is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Although the S&P 500 is down 1.7% over the past six months, Packaging Corporation of America’s stock price has fallen further to $196.44, losing shareholders 8.8% of their capital. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
